name: Youngr - Promises Promises Promises Live From Llamaland Studios

metadata.name: Youngr - Promises, Promises, Promises (Live From Llamaland Studios)
metadata.description:
My second drop on Glass.xyz! The next song from my collection - Promises, Promises, Promises üëè

Everything you see was written, recorded and filmed by me at my studio in ONE TAKE! 

This track was created in that magical lucid dreaming space... Not quite asleep, not quite awake. The hook popped into my head like a cosmic cable was plugged into my brain and downloaded a new song idea. I jumped out of bed at 2am and made this tune 'til the birds started singing, pressed record on the cameras and got this take on the first try! 

Sidenote ... The more of these videos you collect, the bigger the reward when the final album drops üòé (I'm still working out what that might be, but don't worry, it'll be dope!)
